text: I vot naznachili My eto mesto Ibrakhimu (Dlya stanovleniya Svyatogo Doma) I skazali: "Ty v pochitanii Menya Mne souchastnikov inykh ne pridavay! Moy Dom (ot merzosti) ochisti Dlya sovershayushchikh obkhod, Dlya predayushchikhsya (blagochestivym dumam), Dlya preklonivshikhsya (v molitve pered Bogom), Prostertykh nits (pred imenem Yego)
